item.title: Hello all, on 10/26/2020 a young man life was ended due to the...
item.content:encoded:
Black Lives Matter 5280

Hello all, on 10/26/2020 a young man life was ended due to the police killing him. He was a 27year old man named WALTER WALLACE JR. Not only was he a son, he was a father to a host of kids, have a Daughter that’s due any day now and a newlywed to my best friend DOM on 10/02/2020!. I am asking you to help her as she faces the lost of her husband still have to mentally and physically be here for her children along with welcoming a new baby girl in this sad world..... No donation is to small and is forever grateful for what is received a prayer, a listening ear etc..... thank you all!

https://www.gofundme.com/f/92wvm-funding-for-family…

Hello all, on 10/26/2020 a young man life was ended due to the police killing him. He was a 27year… Whitney Mallory needs your support for Funding for Family

item.title: Black Lives Matter 5280The RootProtesters clashed with Philadelphia police, demanding to know why police hadn’t done more to deescalate...
item.content:encoded:
Black Lives Matter 5280The Root

Protesters clashed with Philadelphia police, demanding to know why police hadn’t done more to deescalate the situation—why Walter Wallace Jr., whose family says he had mental health issues, wound up dead during a mental health crisis: https://bit.ly/3kyFGEb

As soon as Walter Wallace Jr. collapsed on the ground, his mother rushed to his side.

theroot.com

Anguished Protesters Confront Police After Officers Fatally Shoot Black Man in West Philadelphia

As soon as Walter Wallace Jr. collapsed on the ground, his mother rushed to his side.As soon as Walter Wallace Jr. collapsed on the ground, his mother rushed to his side.

item.title: Black Lives Matter 5280Mutual Aid DenverAre you a housed resident in downtown Denver? We ask that you strongly consider checking in on your...
item.content:encoded:
Black Lives Matter 5280Mutual Aid Denver

Are you a housed resident in downtown Denver? We ask that you strongly consider checking in on your unhoused neighbors the next couple days. Perhaps bring folx ...hot tea/coffee/cocao, handwarmers, socks, etc. With the right gear, folx can be warm and safe. With the right shelter/tent set-up, folx can survive. Here is some advice if you've never gone over to a tent community: they are humans just like you! Show solidarity by asking how folx are, what they may need or what would be helpful--either supplies or actions. Also remember: many of the people living outside (even during 10 degree weather) are intentionally choosing that over staying in a shelter. There are many reasons why folx don't feel safe or comfortable inside shelters, so please aid folx in surviving where they are at. Lastly, because of all the sweeps in the last couple months, lots of tents, tarps, blankets, etc., have been thrown away by the city, so while you're brewing fresh coffee to put in a carafe, maybe also consider emailing or calling the mayor and telling him to #STOPTHESWEEPS! The Department of Transportation and Infrastructure needs to hear it, too! Also the Department of Public Health and Environment! #RIGHTTOSURVIVE

See More

item.title: #DEMANDS...
item.content:encoded:
#DEMANDS
Immediately fire and revoke the pensions of the officers that murdered Breonna.
Divest from LMPD and Invest in community building
Immediate resignation (or impeachment) of Mayor Greg Fisher
Metro Council ends use of force by Louisville Metro Police Department.
Police shootings are gun violence.
A local, civilian community police accountability council that is independent from the Mayor’s Office and LMPD with investigation and discipline power #CPAC.
The creation of policy to ensure transparent investigation processes
#JusticeforBre #SayHerName
#DefundPolice #DefendBlackLife #KeepGoing #BlackLivesMatterLouisville #JusticeForBreonnaTaylor #InvestDivest

item.title: On #SexWorkerPrideDay this Sunday, September 13th we celebrate....
item.content:encoded:
On #SexWorkerPrideDay this Sunday, September 13th we celebrate.
We celebrate sex workers’ self-determination.
We celebrate sex workers’ enhanced visibility.
We celebrate the achievements of sex worker led organizations.
We celebrate and we keep the fight for decriminalization going until it is won.
#Sexworkiswork#decriminalizesexwork
item.author: Black Lives Matter 5280

item.title: Many have asked about where to donate. We have shared and will...
item.content:encoded:
Black Lives Matter 5280

Many have asked about where to donate. We have shared and will continue to share links to bail/legal support fundraising in Denver, Minneapolis and beyond. We encourage friends to donate to BLM5280’s Emergency Fund using Venmo http://venmo.com/BLM5280 . These donations will be used for bail, legal support, and provision of direct services for Black people impacted by the current and ongoing crisis. If you would like to make a tax-deductible donation that we will have access to at a later date, you can visit our Colorado Gives Day Page to donate through our fiscal sponsor, Rocky Mountain Peace and Justice Center.

Working with residents and organizations in Denver, Black Lives Matter 5280 assists in building more loving and united Black communities while eliminating anti-Black violence and racism. To expose, address and eradicate structures and systems of oppression in Denver, BLM5280 uses a holistic racial j...
